CustomBlocks.Hint0: 这个文件列出了所有用户自定义的方块的信息
CustomBlocks.Hint1: 你可以按照这样的格式自定义添加新的方块，包括mod方块
CustomBlocks.Hint3: baseColor是这种方块对应的基色，是必填项（非常非常重要！！！！！！！）
CustomBlocks.Hint4: id是这种方块的id，也是必填项，最好附带完整的方块状态，必须加minecraft:前缀
CustomBlocks.Hint7: icon是方块对应图片的文件名，它应当放在CustomBlocks文件夹下。必填
CustomBlocks.Hint8: version是方块最早出现的版本。0代表早于1.12，12代表1.12，13代表1.13，如此类推。255代表尚未出现的版本
CustomBlocks.Hint9: idOld是该方块在1.12的方块id（如果有的话），必须加minecraft:前缀，选填，默认为空字符串
CustomBlocks.Hint10: needGlass代表这个方块的下方需要依附其他方块，默认为否
CustomBlocks.Hint11: isGlowing代表这个方块是发光的，默认为否
CustomBlocks.Hint12: endermanPickable代表这个方块可以被末影人偷走，默认为否
CustomBlocks.Hint13: burnable代表这个方块会被火焰、岩浆或闪电点燃并燃烧，默认为否
CustomBlocks.Hint15: 如果json格式出错，整个文件都会无法解析，SlopeCraft会报错。

CustomBlocks.Hint0: This json file includes information of all custom blocks.
CustomBlocks.Hint1: You can add your custom block in such format, including mod-blocks.
CustomBlocks.Hint2: But always remember to follow json format
CustomBlocks.Hint3: baseColor is the base color of this block on map, a compulsory item(EXTREMELY IMPORTANT!!!!)
CustomBlocks.Hint4: id is the block id with full blockstatus with minecraft: prefix. Compulsory item.
CustomBlocks.Hint5: nameZH is the Chinese name. Compulsory item.
CustomBlocks.Hint6: nameEN is the English name. Compulsory item.
CustomBlocks.Hint7: icon is the image filename correspoing to this block, the image should be put under CustomBlocks directory. Compulsory item.
CustomBlocks.Hint8: version is the earliest version when the block is added to Minecraft. 0 means earlier than 1.12, 12 means 1.12, 13 means 1.13, and so on. 255 means future version.
CustomBlocks.Hint9: idOld is the blockid in 1.12 (if there is) with minecraft: prefix. default value is an empty string
CustomBlocks.Hint10: needGlass means if this block must be setted on a solid block, default value is false
CustomBlocks.Hint11: isGlowing means if the block glows, default value is false.
CustomBlocks.Hint12: endermanPickable means if the block can be picked by enderman, default value is false
CustomBlocks.Hint13: burnable means if the block can be lit by fire, lava or lightning blot, default value is false
CustomBlocks.Hint15: The whole file will failed to be parsed once an error occurred in json format, then SlopeCraft will complain.
